name: Salt Flat
description: A vast salt flat provides valuable salt deposits and creates a unique, otherworldly landscape, but the lack of water and extreme temperatures make survival difficult. The reflective surface can disorient travelers, while the salt can be harvested for trade or preservation.
atmosphere: Vast, otherworldly landscape of white salt stretching to horizon. Unique and alien environment. Dry air scented of salt. Reflective surface disorients travelers and creates mirages. Lack of water and extreme temperatures make survival difficult. Otherworldly beauty creates awe and wonder.
